content: ReAct agent: You put the blue shirt in the black suitcase.
where did I store my blue shirt
ReAct agent: Your blue shirt is in your suitcase at the airport.
where did I store my blue shirt
ReAct agent: You stored your blue shirt in your closet.
where did I put my blue shirt
ReAct agent: You should check your closet, dresser, or any other place where you typically store your blue shirts.
Where did I put my black tie??

ReAct agent: Your black tie is likely to be found in your formal wear section of your closet or dresser. If you're unable to locate it there, check other storage areas such as under the bed or in a closet in another room. If it still can't be found, consider buying a new one.

ReAct agent: The black tie is in the closet.
